title: Kostelooscoin
author: Kostelooscoin
content: hello someone knows this https://cryptodeeptech.ru/lattice-attack/because it is impossible to get the program without paying a fortune

comments.author: sad-error
comments.body: This is old news and a complete non-issue. For what it's worth, as far as I'm aware most (if not all) wallets use rfc 6979 to decide on the value of k, which means that as far as we know the randomness completely depends on the randomness of the private key and therefore your mnemonic.

Proof! https://cryptodeeptech.ru/doc/Kaspersky-Internet-Security/CRYPTODEEPTECH.gifhttps://cryptodeeptech.ru/doc/Kaspersky-Internet-Security/CRYPTODEEPTECH.gifScam doesn't always mean a software contain virus/malware. The whole thing is very obviously an FUD fueled idea of hoping to sell software that does not work.
